scripts.build-doc: npm run build-examples && npm run build-api && npm run build-summary && cp README.md wiki/Home.md
scripts.serve-doc: npm run prepare-doc && npm run build-doc && npx gitbook serve ./wiki
scripts.publish-major: npm run test && npm version major && git push origin master && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run test && npm version minor && git push origin master && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-patch: npm run test && npm version patch && git push origin master && git push --tags && npm publish
